overview: He was a young writer whose unique gift was vividly revealed in three genres at once. The Yakutians loved him as a talented poet, playwright and prose writer, the author of many works. However, by the will of fate in the fateful year 1941, the poet, who praised a peaceful life, became a fearless soldier who sacrificed his life in battles with the enemy for our salvation. His life flashed like a comet. But, being a warrior of light, he managed to leave behind something important. Waiting for you and me in our days.
tagline: The film is based on real events.
title: The Heart of a Soldier
